text: Hello! I thank you warmly for your presence and for your welcome here in beautiful Kos, in democratic Kos, in the democratic Dodecanese.It is a great pleasure to be here tonight among you. text: The time is approaching when we will all be judged by this people. text_el: Πλησιάζει η ώρα που θα κριθούμε όλοι απ’ αυτό το λαό.
